name: Patagonia Radalie Bomber Jacket - Women's
description:
Lightweight quilted warmth, just right for chilly shoulder season days. Mixing it up with multiple quilting patterns, the Radalie Bomber Jacket has a funky  style, but even better, it holds warmth in comfortably close.Recycled nylon shell has a DWR finish so it can shake off light rain.Thermogreen® polyester insulation uses 92% recycled material and is warm, even when wet.Mix of diamonds, chevrons and horizontal quilting keeps insulation in place and improves compressibility.Insulated collar provides scarf-like warmth.Zippered handwarmer pockets and an internal zippered chest pocket.Left front pocket doubles as a stuff sack.Elasticized cuffs and hem help seal out the cold.Regular fit.

        Sustainability
